# Project coding standards for Web Development
- Follow the Airbnb JavaScript Style Guide.
- Always prioritize readability and clarity.
- Write clear and concise comments for each function.
- Ensure functions have descriptive names and include type hints.
- Maintain proper indentation (use 2 spaces for each level of indentation).
- Use single quotes for strings, except when using template literals.
- Use Atomic Design principles for component structure.
- Ensure components are reusable and maintainable.
